title: 2x1 Apartment Includes Walk-In Closets & Dual Vanity Sinks!
map_address: 38655 PASEO PADRE PKWY near COUNTRY DRIVE
posting_body: Experience elevated apartment living in the Bay Area when you move into this two-bedroom, one-bathroom apartment at Sycamore Commons!
Both bedrooms feature an oversized walk-in closet for all of your storage needs.
In the shared bathroom, you’ll find a dual vanity set and a refreshing tub.
Across from the dining area, the stylish galley kitchen comes with a tiled backsplash, a breakfast bar, and stainless steel appliances.
The living room is just as impressive with modern ceiling fixtures, energy-efficient lights, and hardwood flooring.
As an added perk, a private deck or patio gives you even more space to relax.
At Sycamore Commons, on-site conveniences include three laundry facilities, a heated pool, and the support of a reliable management and maintenance team.
The community is also just minutes away from Tom Maloney Elementary and Centerville Junior High School.
Speak to a leasing agent for more details!
Sycamore Commons A Place to Call Home!
